name: Angry IT Guy
description:
Entry into Trijam 157 - "The Angriest Protagonist"

The IT guy has had enough. Get all of the computers fixed!

Left click to Punch! The shockwave just might knock other computers into action.

Right click to Type! Potentially fixes a few computers. Don't ask how it fixes broken glass! Can only be done on red screens - if the screen isn't working, try giving it a punch.

Your final score is displayed at the bottom - lower scores are better, higher scores means you probably got pretty angry (every interaction gives one point).

Credits:

Font - "Galaxy monkey" by Tepid Monkey http://www.tepidmonkey.com/

Music - "Extreme Action" by Benjamin Tissot www.bensound.com

Sounds - "The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection" by Juhani Junkala

Game - Made in Unity by Toby Kellaway
